summary:
As a Dutch and European patent attorney I help companies to formulate an IP strategy  in line with their Business strategy. I used to be the Chairwoman of the Supervisory Board at NLO and I also used to be a member of the Advisory Board of SCALE Health. I am currently Statutory director of NLO Belgium.
My technical background is:
- biotechnology, particularly molecular biology
- genomics
- biochemistry
- haematology especially immunology 
- microbiology. 

I often publish articles on European case law. Some examples can be found below.

I have been Chairwoman of the Supervisory Board of NLO during 24 months (2018-2020). \n\nI lead a team of 8 people in biotechnology based in Ghent and Mechelen (BE). We work with start-ups, bigger companies having their own patent department and research institutes. Our clients are based in Europe (the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Spain, Germany, Sweden) and in America. I have extensive experience in drafting and prosecuting complex patent applications (including at the interface between Artificial Intelligence and Biotech). I frequently advise biotech startups on their IP strategies (landscaping study is a middle to help formulating an IP strategy). I am frequently involved in European Opposition Proceedings. I also have experience in supporting complex license negotiations in which IP is pivotal and in advising clients before and during IPO processes (Initial Public Offer).
